content: the photographer hat knit in cascade 220 superwash ​ materials 160 yards of worsted weight yarn 16 circular us 6 & 8 needle us 8 dpns stitch marker darning needle gauge 10 stitches and 12 row = 2 on us 8 in stockinette stitch ​ ​ abbreviations k = knit stitch ​ k2tog = knit two stitches together ​ p = purl stitch ​ pm = place marker ​ size 11 high 20-23 around very stretchy ​ ​ ​ instructions with us 6 co 88 stitches ​ ​ ​ ​ being careful not to twist pm and join in the round as follows row 1 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end of round ​ repeat row 1 until 6 from cast on edge ​ ​ ​ ​ switch to us 8 16 circular needle ​ ​ row 2 knit ​ repeat row 2 until the hat measures 10 from cast on edge ​ ​ ​ ​ begin shaping changing to dpns when necessary ​ row 3 *knit 6 k2tog repeat from * to end of round ​ row 4 knit to end of round ​ row 5 *knit 5 k2tog repeat from * to end of round ​ row 6 knit to end of round ​ row 7 *knit 4 k2tog repeat from * to end of round ​ row 8 knit to end of round ​ row 9 *knit 3 k2tog repeat from * to end of round ​ row 10 knit to end of round ​ row 11 *knit 2 k2tog repeat from * to end of round ​ row 12 knit to end of round ​ row 13 *knit 1 k2tog repeat from * to end of round ​ row 14 knit to end of round ​ row 15 *k2tog repeat from * to end of round ​ cut yarn and draw through remaining stitches weave in ends © lavanya patricella please do not resell or use commercially abhayafibers@gmail com ​ ​ http //lavanyapatricella com | http //ravelry com/lavanyapatricella/ | http //instagram com/lavanyapatricella ​ ​
